data.title: Forms & Policies
data.text:
UC Systemwide Legal Documents & Policies

The most current version of University of California (UC) Terms & Conditions is posted below. Archived UC T&Cs and other legal documents and forms are located in the new UC Procurement Portal: Policy & Compliance.

(For staff access: login to the Procurement Portal Resources with SSO in upper right corner. For public access: please contact Systemwide Procurement or your UC location procurement contact.)

The policies, rules and guidelines shown below may apply or be useful in transactions involving the University of California.
